sentences.english: Similarly, many of us who are on a budget are always on the lookout for a bargain.
sentences.chinese: 類似的，我們大多數有預算壓力的人總是斤斤計較。

sentences.english: This calls for a much more generous, less cheese - paring attitude.
sentences.chinese: 這需要有一種更爲慷慨大度的態度，少一點斤斤計較。

sentences.english: I’m a score-keeper, always calculating who has done what.
sentences.chinese: 我是個斤斤計較的人，老是算計着誰誰做了什麼。
